name: clarinettist
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a person who plays the clarinet: She plays the saxophone and is also a fine clarinettist. The piece was performed by clarinettist Paul Garner. See
clarinet
Agustin Orduna/iStock/Getty Images Plus/GettyImages
More examplesFewer examplesHe is now principal clarinettist of the Philadelphia Orchestra.The Ambrose band included the American clarinettist Danny Polo. Like most young clarinettists in the late 1960s and '70s, he was trained classically.
